headline: BOC EDWARDS TIC INSTRUMENT CONTROLLER 3 HEAD
description: TIC Instrument Controller - 3 Head    TIC can accodomate 3 active gauges and automatically recognizes and controls active gauges including APG100 Pirani, convection, thermocouple, strain, inverted magnetron, wide range and active ion gauges.
